actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The chosen makes one Handaxe attack and two Shortsword attacks.

actions.name: Handaxe
entries: Melee/Ranged atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft. or range 20/60 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage. Hit or Miss: The handaxe magically returns to the chosen's hand immediately after a ranged attack.

actions.name: Shortsword
entries: Melee atk +6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 7 (1d6 + 4 damage) piercing damage.
